TunableList.name: DEGREE_TRAITS
TunableList.description: A list of all possible combinations of degrees, where each list is assigned a specific prestige and honors permutation.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of prestige and honors booleans, and the associated list of degree traits.

Tunable.name: honors
Tunable.description: The honors type (Honors or No Honors) of this degree list.

Tunable.name: prestige
Tunable.description: The prestige type (Prestige or No Prestige) of this degree list.

TunableList.name: traits
TunableList.description: The list of degree traits for this prestige and honors permutation.
